content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/mybatis-generator-plugins is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. I should:

1. First, explore the project structure to understand what we're dealing with
2. Look at the pom.xml (or build.gradle) to see the current Java version configuration
3. Update the Java version to 17 in the build configuration
4. Run `mvn clean verify` to see if there are any compilation or test failures
5. Fix any issues that arise due to the JDK upgrade
6. Repeat until `mvn clean verify` succeeds
